verses.verse: God <S%H430><s%> is our refuge <S%H4268><s%> and strength <S%H5797><s%>, a very <S%H3966><s%> present <S%H4672><s%> help <S%H5833><s%> in trouble <S%H6869><s%>.

Therefore will not we fear <S%H3372><s%>, though the earth <S%H776><s%> be removed <S%H4171><s%>, and though the mountains <S%H2022><s%> be carried <S%H4131><s%> into the middle <S%H3820><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>;

Though the waters <S%H4325><s%> there roar <S%H1993><s%> and be troubled <S%H2560><s%>, though the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shake <S%H7493><s%> with the swelling <S%H1346><s%> there <S%H5542><s%>. Selah.

There is a river <S%H5104><s%>, the streams <S%H6388><s%> of which shall make glad <S%H8055><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, the holy <S%H6918><s%> place of the tabernacles <S%H4908><s%> of the most High <S%H5945><s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> is in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of her <S%H4131><s%>; she shall not be moved: God <S%H430><s%> shall help <S%H5826><s%> her <S%H6437><s%>, and that right early <S%H1242><s%>.
The heathen <S%H1471><s%> raged <S%H1993><s%>, the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> were moved <S%H4131><s%>: he uttered <S%H5414><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, the earth <S%H776><s%> melted <S%H4127><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is with us <S%H430><s%>; the God of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is our refuge <S%H4869><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
Come <S%H3212><s%>, behold <S%H2372><s%> the works <S%H4659><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, what desolations <S%H8047><s%> he has made <S%H7760><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>.

He makes wars <S%H4421><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> unto the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; he breaks <S%H7665><s%> the bow <S%H7198><s%>, and cuts <S%H7112><s%> the spear <S%H2595><s%> in sunder <S%H7112><s%>; he burns <S%H8313><s%> the chariot <S%H5699><s%> in the fire <S%H784><s%>.
Be still <S%H7503><s%>, and know <S%H3045><s%> that I am God <S%H430><s%>: I will be exalted <S%H7311><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, I will be exalted <S%H7311><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is with us <S%H430><s%>; the God of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is our refuge <S%H4869><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
